alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Houston, northeastern Jackson and northwestern Seminole Counties through 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 418 PM EDT/318 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Marianna, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Malone, Greenwood, Bascom, Steam Mill, Lovedale, Haynes, Dellwood, Two Egg, Hornsville, Chattahoochee SP, Lucy, Fairchild, Chipola Terrace, Buena Vista and Marianna Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
